name: Dino Village
description:
The last dinosaurs need you!

Goal:
- The dinosaurs have to survive both the meteor fall and flood.
- The clock is ticking, the cataclysm will come. But you can delay it by shooting the meteor with lasers fueled by biodegradable waste (i.e. dino poop).
- Dinosaurs need food to live and make poop

More details for interested:
- You need to build a shelter and a dam.
- To do that, you will need 3 resources: gold, food and poop.
- To produce them, you will need gold mines, windmills and dinos.

Controls:
- You only need mouse
- Click on poop to gather it
- Click on hungry dino to feed it
- Place new buildings onto available spots to build them
